title: Reconceptualization Framework Design for Strengthening School Autonomy: Learning Outcome-Linked Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of education policy and school operations, foundational knowledge of elementary curricula
context.additional_context: Fostering a deep understanding of the relationship between school autonomy and learning outcomes for general citizens, cultivating practical strategy-building skills through the application of a reconceptualization framework

learning_goals: It is possible to analyze the internal/cultural structural elements of school autonomy and explain their connection to learning outcomes.
Learners can design a framework to evaluate the effects of school autonomy from diverse stakeholder perspectives.
It is possible to propose strategies for enhancing school autonomy by applying a reconceptualization approach.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
